title: How do I enable a screen lock that must be unlocked using a pattern?
answer:
1. Touch Settings > Security < Screen lock > Pattern. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110879) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110880) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110881)

 1. On the Choose your pattern screen, draw your pattern by connecting dots and touch Continue. 

 1. Draw the pattern again to verify it. 

 When you press the power key to light up the screen or power on your phone, you need to draw the pattern to unlock. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110882) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110883)
